vb13:1.2.pli: idha bhikkhu mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharati, tathā dutiyaṃ, tathā tatiyaṃ, tathā catutthaṃ.

vb13:1.3.pli: Iti uddhamadho tiriyaṃ sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantaṃ lokaṃ mettāsahagatena cetasā vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena abyāpajjena pharitvā viharati.

vb13:1.5.pli: Iti uddhamadho tiriyaṃ sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantaṃ lokaṃ karuṇāsahagatena cetasā vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena abyāpajjena pharitvā viharati.

vb13:2.1.pli: Kathañca bhikkhu mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharati?

vb13:2.2.pli: Seyyathāpi nāma ekaṃ puggalaṃ piyaṃ manāpaṃ disvā mettāyeyya;

vb13:3.2.pli: Yā sattesu metti mettāyanā mettāyitattaṃ mettācetovimutti—

vb13:4.2.pli: Yaṃ cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ hadayaṃ paṇḍaraṃ mano manāyatanaṃ manindriyaṃ viññāṇaṃ viññāṇakkhandho tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātu—

vb13:4.4.pli: Idaṃ cittaṃ imāya mettāya sahagataṃ hoti sahajātaṃ saṃsaṭṭhaṃ sampayuttaṃ.

vb13:5.1.pli: “Ekaṃ disan”ti puratthimaṃ vā disaṃ pacchimaṃ vā disaṃ uttaraṃ vā disaṃ dakkhiṇaṃ vā disaṃ uddhaṃ vā adho vā tiriyaṃ vā vidisaṃ vā.

vb13:7.1.pli: “Viharatī”ti iriyati vattati pāleti yapeti yāpeti carati viharati.

vb13:8.1.pli: “Tathā dutiyan”ti yatheva ekaṃ disaṃ tathā dutiyaṃ disaṃ tathā tatiyaṃ disaṃ tathā catutthaṃ disaṃ tathā uddhaṃ tathā adho tathā tiriyaṃ tathā vidisaṃ.

vb13:9.1.pli: “Sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantaṃ lokan”ti sabbena sabbaṃ sabbathā sabbaṃ asesaṃ nissesaṃ.

vb13:10.2.pli: Yā sattesu metti mettāyanā mettāyitattaṃ mettācetovimutti—

vb13:11.4.pli: Idaṃ cittaṃ imāya mettāya sahagataṃ hoti sahajātaṃ saṃsaṭṭhaṃ sampayuttaṃ.

vb13:12.1.pli: “Vipulenā”ti yaṃ vipulaṃ taṃ mahaggataṃ, yaṃ mahaggataṃ taṃ appamāṇaṃ, yaṃ appamāṇaṃ so avero, yo avero so abyāpajjo.

vb13:85.4.pli: Tasseva rūpāvacarassa kusalassa kammassa katattā upacitattā vipākaṃ sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānā …pe… catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati upekkhāsahagataṃ, yā tasmiṃ samaye upekkhā upekkhāyanā upekkhāyitattaṃ upekkhācetovimutti—

vb13:87.2.pli: Idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye rūpāvacaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti kiriyaṃ neva kusalaṃ nākusalaṃ na ca kammavipākaṃ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāraṃ vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati mettāsahagataṃ, yā tasmiṃ samaye metti mettāyanā mettāyitattaṃ mettācetovimutti—

vb13:88.2.pli: Idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye rūpāvacaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti kiriyaṃ neva kusalaṃ nākusalaṃ na ca kammavipākaṃ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāraṃ vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā …pe… dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ …pe…

vb13:88.7.pli: catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati mettāsahagataṃ, yā tasmiṃ samaye metti mettāyanā mettāyitattaṃ mettācetovimutti—

vb13:89.4.pli: Idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye rūpāvacaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti kiriyaṃ neva kusalaṃ nākusalaṃ na ca kammavipākaṃ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāraṃ sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānā …pe… catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati upekkhāsahagataṃ, yā tasmiṃ samaye upekkhā upekkhāyanā upekkhāyitattaṃ upekkhācetovimutti—

vb13:92.1.pli: Idha bhikkhu mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharati tathā dutiyaṃ tathā tatiyaṃ tathā catutthaṃ, iti uddhamadho tiriyaṃ sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantaṃ lokaṃ mettāsahagatena cetasā vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena abyāpajjena pharitvā viharati.

vb13:93.1.pli: Karuṇāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharati tathā dutiyaṃ tathā tatiyaṃ tathā catutthaṃ, iti uddhamadho tiriyaṃ sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantaṃ lokaṃ karuṇāsahagatena cetasā vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena abyāpajjena pharitvā viharati.

vb13:94.1.pli: Muditāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharati tathā dutiyaṃ tathā tatiyaṃ tathā catutthaṃ, iti uddhamadho tiriyaṃ sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantaṃ lokaṃ muditāsahagatena cetasā vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena abyāpajjena pharitvā viharati.

vb13:95.1.pli: Upekkhāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharati tathā dutiyaṃ tathā tatiyaṃ tathā catutthaṃ, iti uddhamadho tiriyaṃ sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantaṃ lokaṃ upekkhāsahagatena cetasā vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena abyāpajjena pharitvā viharati.

vb13:96.1.pli: Catunnaṃ appamaññānaṃ kati kusalā, kati akusalā, kati abyākatā …pe… kati saraṇā, kati araṇā?

vb13:98.1.pli: Tisso appamaññāyo sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā, upekkhā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā.

vb13:99.1.pli: Siyā vipākā, siyā vipākadhammadhammā, siyā nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammā.

vb13:102.1.pli: Tisso appamaññāyo siyā savitakkasavicārā, siyā avitakkavicāramattā, siyā avitakkaavicārā;

vb13:103.1.pli: Tisso appamaññāyo siyā pītisahagatā, siyā sukhasahagatā, na upekkhāsahagatā, siyā na vattabbā pītisahagatāti;

vb13:113.1.pli: Siyā uppannā, siyā anuppannā, siyā uppādino.

vb13:114.1.pli: Siyā atītā, siyā anāgatā, siyā paccuppannā.

vb13:116.1.pli: Siyā ajjhattā, siyā bahiddhā, siyā ajjhattabahiddhā.

vb13:119.1.pli: Mettā hetu, tisso appamaññāyo na hetū, sahetukā, hetusampayuttā.

vb13:119.3.pli: tisso appamaññāyo na vattabbā “hetū ceva sahetukā cā”ti, sahetukā ceva na ca hetū.

vb13:119.5.pli: tisso appamaññāyo na vattabbā “hetū ceva hetusampayuttā cā”ti, hetusampayuttā ceva na ca hetū.

vb13:119.7.pli: mettā na vattabbā “na hetu sahetukā”tipi, “na hetu ahetukā”tipi.

vb13:120.1.pli: Sappaccayā, saṅkhatā, anidassanā, appaṭighā, arūpā, lokiyā, kenaci viññeyyā, kenaci na viññeyyā.

vb13:121.1.pli: No āsavā, sāsavā, āsavavippayuttā, na vattabbā “āsavā ceva sāsavā cā”ti, sāsavā ceva no ca āsavā, na vattabbā āsavā ceva “āsavasampayuttā cā”tipi, “āsavasampayuttā ceva no ca āsavā”tipi.

vb13:123.1.pli: Sārammaṇā, no cittā, cetasikā, cittasampayuttā, cittasaṃsaṭṭhā, cittasamuṭṭhānā, cittasahabhuno, cittānuparivattino, cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānā, cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuno, cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattino, bāhirā, no upādā, siyā upādinnā, siyā anupādinnā.

vb13:124.3.pli: na dassanena pahātabbā, na bhāvanāya pahātabbā, na dassanena pahātabbahetukā, na bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukā.

vb13:124.4.pli: Tisso appamaññāyo siyā savitakkā, siyā avitakkā;

vb13:124.6.pli: Tisso appamaññāyo siyā savicārā, siyā avicārā;

vb13:124.8.pli: Tisso appamaññāyo siyā sappītikā, siyā appītikā;

vb13:124.10.pli: Tisso appamaññāyo siyā pītisahagatā, siyā na pītisahagatā;

vb13:124.12.pli: Tisso appamaññāyo sukhasahagatā, upekkhā na sukhasahagatā.

vb13:124.13.pli: Upekkhā upekkhāsahagatā, tisso appamaññāyo na upekkhāsahagatā, na kāmāvacarā, rūpāvacarā, na arūpāvacarā, pariyāpannā, aniyyānikā, aniyatā, sauttarā, araṇāti.
